{"tests":{"test":"1352299311"},"state":{"Lab 4":"////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Lab 4
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

// Include the checkoff program:
.include "checkoff.uasm"

// Leave the following as zero to run ALL the test cases, and get your solution
//   validated if all pass.  If you have trouble with test case N, set it to N
//   to run JUST that test case (for easier debugging):
TestCase:       LONG(0)

// Quicksort-in-place code.  We include the C/Python version here as a comment;
// you can use this as a model for your Beta assembly version:

//def partition(array,left,right):

partition:
        PUSH(LP)
        PUSH(BP)
        MOVE(SP, BP)

// Fill in your code here...
		PUSH(R1)
		PUSH(R2)
		PUSH(R3)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(R5)
		PUSH(R6)
		PUSH(R7)
		PUSH(R8)
		PUSH(R9)
		PUSH(R10)
		PUSH(R11)
		
		LD(BP,-12,R1)
		LD(BP,-16,R2)
		LD(BP,-20,R3)
		
		parray = R1
		pleft = R2
		pright = R3
		pivot_index = R4
		pivot_value = R5
		store_index = R6
		
		//    # choose middle element of array as pivot
		//    pivotIndex = (left+right) >> 1;
		
		ADD(pleft, pright, R0)
		SHRC(R0, 1, pivot_index)
		
		//    pivotValue = array[pivotIndex]
		
		SHLC(pivot_index, 2, R0)
		ADD(parray, R0, R0)
		LD(R0, 0, pivot_value)
		
		//    # swap array[right] and array[pivotIndex]
		//    # note that we already store array[pivotIndex] in pivotValue
		//    array[pivotIndex] = array[right]
		
		SHLC(pright, 2, R7)
		ADD(parray, R7, R7)
		LD(R7, 0, R7)
		ST(R7, 0, R0)
		
		//    # elements <= the pivot are moved to the left (smaller indices)
		//    storeIndex = left
		
		MOVE(pleft, store_index)
		
		//    for i in xrange(left,right):  # don't include array[right]
		
		i = R7
		temp = R8
		MOVE(pleft, i)
		
		//        temp = array[i]
		//        if temp <= pivotValue:
		L1: 
		
			CMPLT(i, pright, R0) // i < p_right
			BEQ(R0, L2, R31) // If i >= p_right, exit for loop

			// Finding array[i]
			SHLC(i, 2, R0) // Store 4x index in R0
			ADD(parray, R0, R0) // R0 <- Address to array[i]
			LD(R0, 0, temp) // temp <- value of array[i]

			CMPLE(temp, pivot_value, R9) // R9 <- temp <= pivotValue
			BEQ(R9, L3, R31) // If temp > pivotVaulue, skip to L3

			// get array[storeIndex]
			SHLC(store_index, 2, R10) // R10 store 4x storeIndex
			ADD(parray, R10, R10) // R10 <- Address to array[storeIndex]
			LD(R10, 0, R11) // R11 <- value of array[storeIndex]

			ST(R11, 0, R0) // Store value of array[storeIndex] to address of array[i]
			ST(temp, 0, R10) // Store value of temp to address of array[storeIndex]

			ADDC(store_index, 1, store_index)

		//            storeIndex += 1
		L3:
			ADDC(i, 1, i)
			BR(L1)
	
		
		L2:
		//    # move pivot to its final place
		//    array[right] = array[storeIndex]
		//    array[storeIndex] = pivotValue;
		//    return storeIndex;

			// Get array[storeIndex]
			SHLC(store_index, 2, R10) // R10 store 4x storeIndex
			ADD(parray, R10, R10) // R10 <- Address to array[storeIndex]
			LD(R10, 0, R11) // R11 <- value of array[storeIndex]

			// Get array[right] address
			SHLC(pright, 2, R9) // R9 <- 4x p_right
			ADD(parray, R9, R9) // R9 <- Address to array[right]
			ST(R11, 0, R9) // array[right] <- array[storeIndex]

			ST(pivot_value, 0, R10) // array[storeIndex] <- pivotValue

			// return storeIndex
			MOVE(store_index, R0)
			
		POP(R11)
		POP(R10)
		POP(R9)
		POP(R8)
		POP(R7)
		POP(R6)
		POP(R5)
		POP(R4)
		POP(R3)
		POP(R2)
		POP(R1)
        MOVE(BP, SP)
        POP(BP)
        POP(LP)
        JMP(LP)


//def quicksort(array, left, right):
//    if left < right:
//        pivotIndex = partition(array,left,right)

// quicksort(ArrayBase, left, right)
quicksort:
        PUSH(LP)
        PUSH(BP)
        MOVE(SP, BP)

// Fill in your code here...
		PUSH(R1)    
		PUSH(R2)
		PUSH(R3)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(R5)
		
		LD(BP,-12,R1) // saves array to R1
		LD(BP,-16,R2) // saves left to R2
		LD(BP,-20,R3) // saves right to R3
		
		array = R1
		left = R2
		right = R3
		
		CMPLT(left, right, R0) // R0 left<right
		BEQ(R0, END, R31)
		
		PUSH(right)
		PUSH(left)
		PUSH(array)
		CALL(partition)
		POP(array)
		POP(left)
		POP(right)
		
		MOVE(R0, R5)
		
		//        quicksort(array,left,pivotIndex-1)
		
		SUBC(R5, 1, R4)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(left)
		PUSH(array)
		CALL(quicksort)
		POP(array)
		POP(left)
		POP(R4)
		
		
		//        quicksort(array,pivotIndex+1,right)
		
		ADDC(R5, 1, R4)
		PUSH(right)
		PUSH(R4)
		PUSH(array)
		CALL(quicksort)
		POP(array)
		POP(R4)
		POP(right)
		
END:
		POP(R5)
		POP(R4)
		POP(R3)
		POP(R2)
		POP(R1)
        MOVE(BP, SP)
        POP(BP)
        POP(LP)
        JMP(LP)
		

// Allocate a stack: SP is initialized by checkoff code.
StackBasePtr:
        LONG(StackArea)

.unprotect

StackArea:
        STORAGE(1000)
"}}
